properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 24 at 3:11PM EST until January 25 at 11:00AM EST by NWS Binghamton NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...Freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations of a
light glaze.

* WHERE...Pike and Wayne Counties.

* WHEN...From 3 AM to 11 AM Saturday.

* IMPACTS...Very slippery sidewalks, roads and bridges are
possible.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible
power outages.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

The Pennsylvania Department of Transportation and Pennsylvania
Turnpike Commission remind motorist to adjust speeds based on
driving conditions as winter weather impacts Pennsylvania
roadways. Visit www.511pa.com for the latest travel, roadways,
and traffic conditions.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 11 AM EST SATURDAY
